basic.description: Based on the regular departmental seminar program offered during the fall and winter, this non-credit course is to be taken every year by all Ph.D. students once they have completed CHEM-803*. As part of this course students must attend a minimum number of departmental seminars as well as present one seminar on their research prior to their thesis submission. Fall/Winter. D. Pratt (Seminar Coordinator) <a href="http://www.chem.queensu.ca/chemistryN/About/seminarseriesN.asp">http://www.chem.queensu.ca/chemistryN/About/seminarseriesN.asp
basic.subject: CHEM
basic.title: Chemistry Seminar Program
